home.title: Find a freelancer — or find an order — fast and safely
home.subtitle: {siteName} connects clients and professionals in Georgia: profiles with portfolios, order listings, and budgets in GEL.

fastSelection.title: Fast search
fastSelection.description: Find specialists by category, price, and experience. Short listings and detailed profiles.

secureProcess.title: Safe process
secureProcess.description: Agreements, delivery, and reviews in one place. Transparent communication and history.

gelBudget.title: GEL budgets
gelBudget.description: Set budgets in GEL with simple invoicing and reporting for businesses.

steps.title: 3 steps to get started
steps.subtitle: For clients and freelancers — everything in one place.

items.title: Post an order or pick a freelancer
items.description: Describe requirements, budget, and timeline. Get proposals or message top specialists directly.

items.title: Confirm the agreement
items.description: Agree on scope, milestones, and communication — all in one workspace.

items.title: Get results and leave a review
items.description: After delivery, leave feedback — it builds trust and quality.

ctaCard.title: Get started today
ctaCard.description: Create a profile, add a portfolio, and get your first jobs in Georgia.

items.name: Nino, Marketing Manager
items.quote: I found a designer in two days who matched our brand perfectly. The agreement and communication were very smooth.

items.name: Giorgi, Freelance Developer
items.quote: With portfolios and reviews, clients trust me faster. Great orders show up often.

items.name: Mariam, Small Business Owner
items.quote: Posting budgets in GEL helped a lot. The process is transparent and saves us time.

items.q: How do I post an order?
items.a: Go to the “Post an order” page, describe the task, budget, and timeline.

items.q: How do I choose a freelancer?
items.a: Compare profiles, portfolios, and reviews, then reach out.
Yes — support is available via email and (soon) chat.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: Check the link or go back to the home page.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.subtitle: Freela is a freelance marketplace built for Georgia — find specialists by category, budget, and experience, then talk in chat.
aboutPage.missionBody: Make cooperation between clients and freelancers in Georgia simple and clear — with stable categories, quick search, and communication in one place.
missionPoints: For clients — post an order and review proposals.
For freelancers — create a profile and pick exactly one category.
For everyone — chat and share files with full history.

howSteps.title: Create an account
howSteps.description: Sign up as a client or freelancer. Freelancers choose one required category.

howSteps.title: Browse and match
howSteps.description: Search orders or freelancers using category, budget, and sorting.

howSteps.title: Chat and deliver
howSteps.description: Discuss details in chat, send files, and keep everything organized.

cards.title: Clear categories
cards.description: Static categories prevent duplicates and make search predictable.

cards.title: Simple filtering
cards.description: Category, budget, and sorting help you find the right match faster.

cards.title: Built-in chat
cards.description: Messages and file sharing keep collaboration organized.

aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Create your account or browse freelancers in the directory.

contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.subtitle: Have questions? Message us and we’ll help.

pricingPage.title: Pricing
pricingPage.subtitle: Choose a plan that fits your needs. You can always upgrade later.

legalTermsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
legalTermsPage.subtitle: Terms that govern the use of Freela.

0.title: 1. Overview
0.body: Freela is a marketplace that connects employers and freelancers. Using the website means you agree to these terms.

1.title: 2. Accounts
1.body: You are responsible for keeping your login credentials safe and for the actions performed under your account.

2.title: 3. Orders & communication
2.body: Users must provide accurate information and communicate respectfully. We may suspend accounts for abuse or fraud.

3.title: 4. Disclaimer
3.body: Freela is a platform. We do not guarantee outcomes of agreements between users.

legalPrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
legalPrivacyPage.subtitle: This policy explains how Freela collects, uses, and protects personal data when you use the service.

0.title: 1. Information we collect
0.body: We collect information you provide (such as account details, profile information, and content you submit on the platform) and information generated through your use of Freela (such as log data, device and browser information, and cookies). We may also process communications you send to other users or to support to operate the service and keep it safe.

1.title: 2. How we use personal data
1.body: We use personal data to create and manage accounts, provide core marketplace functionality, personalize and improve features, communicate with you about your account and service updates, provide customer support, and detect, prevent, and investigate fraud, abuse, and security issues. We may also use data to comply with applicable legal obligations and enforce our terms.

2.title: 3. Sharing and disclosures
2.body: We do not sell personal data. We may share limited information with service providers that help us operate Freela (for example, hosting, analytics, email delivery, and customer support tools), and with other users as part of normal platform functionality (for example, information shown on your profile and in order communications). We may disclose information if required by law, to protect our rights, users, or the public, or in connection with a corporate transaction (such as a merger or asset sale).

3.title: 4. Your rights and choices
3.body: You can access and update certain account and profile information in your settings. Depending on your location and applicable law, you may have additional rights such as requesting access, correction, deletion, or portability of your personal data, or objecting to certain processing. To make a request or ask questions about this policy, contact us at {email}. We may need to verify your identity before fulfilling requests.
